Message:
Hordes of cursed creatures
appeared and besieged
the castle without warning.

The kingdom’s knights are
completely annihilated—
save for me—

and the flood of creatures
storm the castle walls.

Far from here, Queen Amleth
flees for her life...!

I must stop these infernal
creatures before they get to her...
Is that not why I am still alive?!

I scream frantically
at my wounded body.

However, nothing moves—
not my feet...nor my fingers...

Every part of my body is
crippled from all the blood
I’ve lost.

To die in a place like this,
unable to protect you...!

In that moment,
I heard her voice—

“I shall give you the power
to vanquish all that stand
in your way...”
